answer: The corporation entering into agreement with Amstar Corporation is named "AMSTAR." This information can be found in the first paragraph of the license agreement, which states: "This AGREEMENT made this day of August, 1976, by and between AMSTAR CORPORATION, a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Delaware (hereinafter called "AMSTAR") having its principal office at 1251 Avenue of the Americas, New York, New York 10020 and PAUL SALTMAN, an individual (hereinafter referred to as "SALTMAN"), residing at [insert address]."
